name: Pillage (itch)
description:
I created the Pillage as a board game and tried to get it published by several different board game manufacturers with no luck. I figured that I don't have enough money to publish it myself so I developed a PC version.

Feel free to tell me if it's any good in the comments or send an email to washhasz@gamio.com. ;) 

How to run on Windows. Unpack .zip and double click on the pillage.exe How to run on Mac. Unpack .zip Move Pillage 1.0 MAC.app to /Applications directory Open console and type ‘chmod -R 700 /Applications/Pillage\ 1.0\ MAC.app/’ Now try to run the game. There will be a warning message. Go to Apple -> system preferences -> Security & Privacy Click open anyway. (I don't want to go thru the whole apple process of authorizing that app at least yet. So if you are mac owner and still want to play you have to do that.)
